about_the_game:
It Was You is a first-person multiplayer murder mystery party for 5-12 players. Upon arrival, party attendees will be given a role only known to them - Detective or Killer - and tools to manipulate, uncover, or plant evidence of a murder.

Detectives use various investigation tools to uncover evidence, build a case, and vote to exile all the Killers.

Killers work together to secretly murder the Detectives and deceive partygoers by manipulating the evidence of their crime with deception items.

Key Features

  • Acoustic Proximity Voice Chat: All sounds in It Was You, including player voice chat, echo the halls with realistic reverberation and occlusion. When a player enters a room and shuts the door, conversations from outside are naturally muffled, adding an unprecedented degree of immersion.

  • Non-Player Guests: Killers must eliminate these NPCs first, creating a buffer that allows every detective to investigate and participate in the narrative before they risk becoming victims.

  • Investigation Tools: Uncover fingerprints, footprints, or blood with various tools to help you get to the root of who among you is a killer.

  • Deception Items & Abilities: Manipulate evidence and evade detection. Items like a spray bottle or tape will let you manipulate the crime scene by removing or planting fingerprints.

  • Secret Passages: Slip away and cover your tracks. Use the concealed bookshelf in the library or discover one of the many other hidden passages.

Premise

Decked out in their favorite costumes, a group of friends gather at the abandoned Tylock Estate for a Halloween murder mystery party that promises to be life-changing.

Excitement buzzes as the group shows off their costumes and dives head-first into an intricate mystery crafted for them by their friend - each of them assuming their assigned role of Detective or Killer.

As the first round draws to a close, the game begins to take a dark turn. The “murders” start to feel all too real and the evidence - once just playful props - quickly becomes key to the cast’s survival. As suspicions rise and horrified friends turn on one another, exiling those they presume to be accursed, one question lingers: What happens when a game is no longer a game and what happens when you can’t quit?

The Cast

Step - literally - into the lives of a unique cast of twelve characters as you possess the Tylock Estate’s intrepid partygoers and experience It Was You’s mystery through them. Uncover the sordid circumstances that shape the group’s mind-bending paradox and witness their tragedy as they each fight tooth-and-nail for mere seconds of lucidity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

short_description: A multiplayer murder mystery party for up to 12 players. Assume the role of Detective or Killer and use tools to uncover—or manipulate—evidence. Murder, investigate, discuss and deceive. Put your true-crime-solving skills to the test, or see if you are capable of cold-blooded murder.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
